name: Graphic Design
description: Showcase your skills in design, sketching, technical drawing, draping, pattern making and construction. Use design software to create a finished product you can be proud of.

description: Showcase your skills in design, sketching, technical drawing, draping, pattern making and construction. Use design software to create a finished product you can be proud of.

name: IT Software Solutions for Business
description: Develop and test software systems and solutions, undertake the integration of several systems and software and perform a cost benefit analysis. Get a window into the world of software developers.

name: Visual Merchandising
description: Use paint brushes, Illustrator, Photoshop, and CorelDraw to create window and interior displays and communicate directly with the target audience through your designs. Create a positive impression designed to increase sales revenue.

name: Solar Energy
description: If you are passionate about the environment and familiar with the components and workings of solar energy systems and power plants, and the installation processes, then this skill category is the right fit for you.

name: Digital Photography
description: Photography can lead to many opportunities for self-employment and serve as a secondary source of income. JuniorSkills championship 2021 is an excellent platform for you to showcase your talents and learn from experts in the field of Digital photography.
